name: Pulsewave
description:
Welcome to Pulsewave! An experimental rhythmic combo-based racing game aimed to get you in a groove.

Controls 

Move to the beat: 

 - Left / Right Arrows - 

- A / D Keys - 

- Controller D-Pad -

- Touchscreen swipe left/right -

Let the beat guide you through this high-speed race to the finish.

Good luck! See how big of a combo you're able to rack up
